scripts.nosql:rooms: npm run nosql:rooms1 && npm run nosql:rooms2
scripts.nosql:reservations: npm run nosql:reservations1 && npm run nosql:reservations2 && npm run nosql:reservations3 && npm run nosql:reservations4 && npm run nosql:reservations5 && npm run nosql:reservations6 && npm run nosql:reservations7 && npm run nosql:reservations8 && npm run nosql:reservations9 && npm run nosql:reservations10
scripts.nosql:seed: npm run nosql:rooms && npm run nosql:reservations
scripts.sql:rooms1: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy rooms (room_id, nightly_rate, person_capacity, tax) FROM './seed/csv/rooms1.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:rooms2: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy rooms (room_id, nightly_rate, person_capacity, tax) FROM './seed/csv/rooms2.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:reservations1: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy reservations (reservation_id, room_id, check_in, check_out, cost) FROM './seed/csv/reservations1.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:reservations2: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy reservations (reservation_id, room_id, check_in, check_out, cost) FROM './seed/csv/reservations2.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"

scripts.sql:reservations6: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy reservations (reservation_id, room_id, check_in, check_out, cost) FROM './seed/csv/reservations6.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:reservations7: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy reservations (reservation_id, room_id, check_in, check_out, cost) FROM './seed/csv/reservations7.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:reservations8: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy reservations (reservation_id, room_id, check_in, check_out, cost) FROM './seed/csv/reservations8.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:reservations9: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy reservations (reservation_id, room_id, check_in, check_out, cost) FROM './seed/csv/reservations9.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:reservations10: psql -U postgres -d airbnb -c "\copy reservations (reservation_id, room_id, check_in, check_out, cost) FROM './seed/csv/reservations10.csv' DELIMITER ',' CSV HEADER;"
scripts.sql:rooms: npm run sql:rooms1 && npm run sql:rooms2
scripts.sql:reservations: npm run sql:reservations1 && npm run sql:reservations2 && npm run sql:reservations3 && npm run sql:reservations4 && npm run sql:reservations5 && npm run sql:reservations6 && npm run sql:reservations7 && npm run sql:reservations8 && npm run sql:reservations9 && npm run sql:reservations10
scripts.sql:seed: npm run sql:airbnb && npm run sql:rooms && npm run sql:reservations
